Calculate infection fatality rate (IFR), infection hospitalisation rate, and hospitalisation fatality rate (HFR) from Philippines data

Source: R/ph_calculate_rates.R
ph_calculate_rates.Rd

Calculate infection fatality rate (IFR), infection hospitalisation rate, and hospitalisation fatality rate (HFR) from Philippines data

ph_calculate_rates(date = Sys.Date())

Arguments

date

Date in <YYYY-MM-DD> format; This is the date up to which extracted data reports to. Default is current date (Sys.Date())

Value

A data.frame with calculated IHR, IFR, and HFR by age group structure consistent with CoMo model data structure requirements.

Examples

ph_calculate_rates(date = "2020-04-17")
#>    age_category deaths deathsAdmitted admissions cases         ifr       ihr
